name: Gun Mayhem
description:
An experiment gone wrong has left you at the mercy of death points. Everytime you die you lose a death point but your current powerup gets activated. You're here to get revenge on the person who ran the facility in which you were tested on. Your job is to find him and execute him.

I will continue updating this game after the jam has ended cause I really like the concept so stay tuned for updates and if you find any bugs please post a comment and explain how you got the bug! I hope you have a great day and I hope you have fun playing!

If you want to donate I have a patreon account I also have a twitch channel on which I streamed the whole making of this game and a discord server!

----------- Controls -----------

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Click

Pickup Weapon - E

Drop Weapon - Q

To enter the shop just touch it.
